tool

Class Span

  • java.lang.Object
    • tool.Span

  • public class Span
extends java.lang.Object
    Span class is used to save the span of a gene in the sentences. It also provides a method to calculate a new span which ignores white spaces. The class can be saved in hashMap as a key.
    Author:
    Carol Cheng
